00125 void usage(void)
00126 {
00127         fprintf(stderr, "req-layout -- prints lustre request layouts\n");
00128 }
00129 
00130 void printt_field(const char *prefix, const struct req_msg_field *fld)
00131 {
00132 }
00133 
00134 void print_layout(const struct req_format *rf)
00135 {
00136         int j;
00137         int k;
00138 
00139         int offset;
00140         int variable;
00141 
00142         static const char *prefix[RCL_NR] = {
00143                 [RCL_CLIENT] = "C",
00144                 [RCL_SERVER] = "S"
00145         };
00146 
00147         printf("L %s (%zu/%zu)\n", rf->rf_name,
00148                rf->rf_fields[RCL_CLIENT].nr, rf->rf_fields[RCL_SERVER].nr);
00149 
00150         for (j = 0; j < RCL_NR; ++j) {
00151                 offset = 0;
00152                 variable = 0;
00153                 for (k = 0; k < rf->rf_fields[j].nr; ++k) {
00154                         const struct req_msg_field *fld;
00155 
00156                         fld = rf->rf_fields[j].d[k];
00157 
00158                         printf("        F%s %i [%3.3i%s %-20.20s (",
00159                                prefix[j], k, offset,
00160                                variable ? " + ...]" : "]      ",
00161                                fld->rmf_name);
00162                         if (fld->rmf_size > 0) {
00163                                 printf("%3.3i) ", fld->rmf_size);
00164                                 offset += fld->rmf_size;
00165                         } else {
00166                                 printf("var) ");
00167                                 variable = 1;
00168                         }
00169                         if (fld->rmf_flags & RMF_F_STRING)
00170                                 printf("string");
00171                         printf("\n");
00172                 }
00173                 if (k > 0 && j != RCL_NR - 1)
00174                         printf("        -----------------------------------\n");
00175         }
00176 }
00177 
00178 void print_layouts(void)
00179 {
00180         int i;
00181 
00182         for (i = 0; i < ARRAY_SIZE(req_formats); ++i) {
00183                 print_layout(req_formats[i]);
00184                 printf("\n");
00185         }
00186 }
00187 
00188 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00189 {
00190         int opt;
00191         int verbose;
00192 
00193         verbose = 0;
00194         do {
00195                 opt = getopt(argc, argv, "hb:k:r:p:v");
00196                 switch (opt) {
00197                 case 'v':
00198                         verbose++;
00199                 case -1:
00200                         break;
00201                 case '?':
00202                 default:
00203                         fprintf(stderr, "Unable to parse options.");
00204                 case 'h':
00205                         usage();
00206                         return 0;
00207                 }
00208         } while (opt != -1);
00209         print_layouts();
00210         return 0;
00211 }
